name: Blueno
text: [Activate: Main] You may discard 1 card from your hand and place this character in your trash: Play up to one cost 5 or lower character with {CP} included in its types from your trash.

effect.text: You may discard 1 card from your hand and place this character in your trash: Play up to one cost 5 or lower character with {CP} included in its types from your trash.
